comment._content: Probably Elihu Cunyngham Church, Deputy at Sing Sing see The New York Times, November 23, 1915 query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=FA0B14F6395D16... The Washington times, September 03, 1915, HOME EDITION, Page 5 "FIVE SLAYERS DIE IN SING SING CHAIR" chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84026749/1915-09-03/ed-... New-York tribune., November 02, 1915, p. 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-11-02/ed-...
